Ontologies

IBM Rational Software Architect V9.1, gracias a su conexion con "The Design Management V4.0 server". Ademas, dicen que "A Domain Toolkit is added to the Design Management server that enables server side extensibility. It allows teams and business partners to define custom design domains (throught an ontology editor." [informacion general del producto:
http://www-01.ibm.com/common/ssi/printableversion.wss?docURL=/common/ssi/rep_sm/0/897/ENUS5725-A30/index.html
][MariCarmen]
IBM Rational Rhapsody V8.1. "The domain toolkit enables you to create custom design domains in Rational Rhapsody Design Manager server. Define new domains through an ontology editor."  [informacion general del producto:
http://www-01.ibm.com/common/ssi/ShowDoc.wss?docURL=/common/ssi/rep_sm/0/649/ENUS5724-X70/index.html&lang=en&request_locale=en
] [MariCarmen].
CRAFT (aunque es un poco antiguo: 2009) [Publicaciones relacionadas:
http://researcher.watson.ibm.com/researcher/view_group_pubs.php?grp=1746
] [MariCarmen]
IODT: "IBM Integrated Ontology Development Toolkit "  que incluye (en principio, pero no lo encuentro, la web apunta al community group pero no encuentro el sw
http://www.alphaworks.ibm.com/tech/semanticstk
) [María Poveda]:
EODM Workbench is an Eclipse-based editor for users to create, view and generate OWL ontologies
Minerva is a high performance ontology repository built on relational databases. It completely follows W3C’s Web Ontology Language (OWL) and SPARQL Query Language for Resource Description Framework
